author: fwyzard
body:
For the changes since ROCm 6.4.3, see
  - the [ROCm 7.0.2 release notes](https://rocm.docs.amd.com/en/docs-7.0.2/about/release-notes.html)
  - the [ROCm 7.1.0 release notes](https://rocm.docs.amd.com/en/docs-7.1.0/about/release-notes.html)
title: Update ROCm to version 7.1.0
